sentences.sContent: The poor pauper paused on purpose to pawn a porpoise.
sentences.sContent_eng: The poor pauper paused on purpose to pawn a porpoise.
sentences.sCn: 贫穷的乞丐有意停下来典当一只海豚。

sentences.sContent: He guards the sleep of his pauper master as if he were a prince.
sentences.sContent_eng: He guards the sleep of his pauper master as if he were a prince.
sentences.sCn: 它会像守护着王子一样守护着正在睡觉的乞丐主人。

sentences.sContent: He guards the sleep of his pauper master as if he were a prince.
sentences.sContent_eng: He guards the sleep of his pauper master as if he were a prince.
sentences.sCn: 纵然主人是乞丐，它也像守护王子一样伴随着他。

synos.tran: 乞丐；穷人；靠救济度日者

remMethod.val: paup(少) ＋ er → 财富少的人 → 贫民

words.tran: 贫穷化；使成为受救济过活的贫民
